en: Items from the collection of the Leiden University Libraries. Including some material for testing purposes.

The Digital Collections of Leiden University Libraries contains over 500,000 digitized primary sources, reference works and digital born materials held by Leiden University Libraries. In this repository you will find digital facsimiles of prints, drawings, photographs, maps and archival documents; digital facsimiles of manuscript books and rare books; and also digital facsimiles of catalogues and inventories of the Leiden holdings. You will also find collection guides and online exhibitions. Learn more about Digital Collections in a series of videos.
